attributes.action: Restrict the marketing and promotion of ‘skinny’ quick-fix, laxative products.
attributes.additional_details: Companies that sell these products should be forced to inform their customers of all possible side effects, and true reflections of the results, rather than promoting an image of a figure that was not created by using their products alone.
attributes.background: Social media is inundated with ‘skinny’ teas, with laxative ingredients. These companies are selling an unrealistic and damaging ideal to their audience. Products containing laxative ingredients have been proven to have serious medical consequences.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are already advertising rules for weight-loss and slimming products. 

You can find out more here:

https://www.asa.org.uk/topic/Weight_and_slimming.html
